name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Solutions Engineer with 13+ years of full stack development expertise, skilled in delivering innovative solutions for decentralized applications and smart contracts within blockchain technology. Proficient in **Solidity**, **Rust**, and **MOVE**, enabling the creation of tokenized assets and Real World Assets (RWA) while providing architectural recommendations and technical configurations.
Experienced in technical discovery and product demonstrations that effectively articulate the value of complex solutions to customers, driving sales processes and ensuring customer success. 
Strong proficiency in cloud-native application deployment and microservices architecture using **AWS** and **Azure**. Demonstrated ability in developing AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and automation, leveraging advanced frameworks like **Python**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and event-driven architectures. Committed to compliance-driven development with extensive knowledge of HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
